tests.name: clodo-service --help
tests.output:
ğŸ“‹ Using default framework configuration
âœ… Environment variables validated successfully
Usage: clodo-service [options] [command]

Unified conversational CLI for Clodo Framework service lifecycle management

Options:
  -V, --version                      output the version number
  -h, --help                         display help for command

Commands:
  create [options]                   Create a new Clodo service with
                                     conversational setup
  deploy [options]                   Deploy a Clodo service with smart
                                     credential handling
  validate <service-path>            Validate an existing service configuration
  update [options] [service-path]    Update an existing service configuration
  diagnose [options] [service-path]  Diagnose and report issues with an
                                     existing service
  assess [options] [service-path]    Run intelligent capability assessment
                                     (requires @tamyla/clodo-orchestration)
  list-types                         List available service types and their
                                     features
  help [command]                     display help for command

tests.name: clodo-service create --help
tests.output:
ğŸ“‹ Using default framework configuration
âœ… Environment variables validated successfully
Usage: clodo-service create [options]

Create a new Clodo service with conversational setup

Options:
  -n, --non-interactive         Run in non-interactive mode with all required
                                parameters
  --service-name <name>         Service name (required in non-interactive mode)
  --service-type <type>         Service type: data-service, auth-service,
                                content-service, api-gateway, generic (default:
                                "generic")
  --domain-name <domain>        Domain name (required in non-interactive mode)
  --cloudflare-token <token>    Cloudflare API token (required in
                                non-interactive mode)
  --cloudflare-account-id <id>  Cloudflare account ID (required in
                                non-interactive mode)
  --cloudflare-zone-id <id>     Cloudflare zone ID (required in non-interactive
                                mode)
  --environment <env>           Target environment: development, staging,
                                production (default: "development")
  --output-path <path>          Output directory for generated service
                                (default: ".")
  --template-path <path>        Path to service templates (default:
                                "./templates")
  -h, --help                    display help for command

  --zone-id <id>         Cloudflare zone ID
  --dry-run              Simulate deployment without making changes
  --quiet                Quiet mode - minimal output
  --service-path <path>  Path to service directory (default: ".")
